titles.title: To provide for conveyances of certain lands in Alaska to Chickaloon-Moose Creek Native Association, Inc., Ninilchik Native Association, Inc., Seldovia Native Association, Inc., Tyonek Native Corporation, and Knikatnu, Inc. under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from Interior.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 26 - 13.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 104-643.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 323.

bill.summary: 6/27/1996--Reported to House amended. Amends Federal law to provide for conveyance of certain Alaskan lands under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to: (1) Chickaloon-Moose Creek Native Association, Inc.; (2) Knikatnu, Inc.; (3) Ninilchik Native Association, Inc.; (4) Seldovia Native Association, Inc.; and (5) Tyonek Native Corporation.
